title: General Manager
job_category: Admin / Secretarial, Advertising / Media, F&B, General Management, Human Resources
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
At the most fundamental level, management is a discipline that consists of a set of five general functions: planning, organizing, staffing, leading and controlling.

Overseeing daily business operations. Developing and implementing growth strategies. Training low-level managers and staff. General Managers set policies, operations, create and maintain budgets.

Mentally prepared to bring the company to the next level according to execute the director's goals & directions set for company.

title: Cafe Manager
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The responsibilities of a caf√© manager include, but are not limited to, working closely in a supervisory role with staff members, overseeing scheduling, monitoring productivity, and providing feedback to ensure that staff are providing the best experience possible to customers. Additionally, a caf√© manager must monitor budgets, including expenses, sales, and profit margins. They also track and maintain inventory to ensure that supplies are available as needed.
A successful caf√© manager will have experience working in various roles within a coffee shop and be available to work flexible shifts including weekends and holidays. The goal of the caf√© manager is to increase the profit margins of their coffee shop and to establish a loyal customer base to make the caf√© a local hotspot for the community.

Responsibilities :
¬∑ Manage day-to-day operations of the caf√©
¬∑ Hire and onboard new wait staff and baristas
¬∑ Train employees on drinks preparation and proper use of coffee equipment
¬∑ Coordinate with vendors and order supplies, as needed (like takeaway cups, coffee, milk and other ingredients)
¬∑ Maintain updated records of daily, weekly and monthly revenues and expenses
¬∑ Add new menu items based on seasonality and customers‚Äô preferences (for example vegan coffee drinks)
¬∑ Advise staff on the best ways to resolve issues with clients and deliver excellent customer service
¬∑ Ensure all cafe areas are clean and tidy
¬∑ Nurture friendly relationships with customers to increase loyalty and boost our reputation

Qualifications :
¬∑ Work experience as a Cafe Manager or Barista
¬∑ Hands-on experience with professional coffee machines
¬∑ Good math skills
¬∑ Availability to work within opening hours (including weekends and holidays)
¬∑ Excellent communication skills with the ability to manage and motivate a team
¬∑ Customer service attitude

title: STORE MANAGER
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Oversee the daily store operations and its manpower planning
‚Ä¢ Hire, train, motivate and manage the team to achieve the best results
‚Ä¢ Responsible for admin duties in the outlet including but not limited to inventory management, sales forecast, invoices consolidation, generate reports such as sales report or costing report and attend management meetings
‚Ä¢ Conduct monthly inventory checks in operating equipment and supplies
‚Ä¢ Work closely with relevant personnel at all levels by maintaining an effective communication, to ensure smooth execution of various activities/promotions
‚Ä¢ Ensure smooth operations of the store with compliance to product quality, hygiene & safety standards
‚Ä¢ Appraise employees for their performance regularly and provide feedback to improve performance
‚Ä¢ Involve in investigation of issues relating to customer feedbacks on service and product quality
‚Ä¢ To maintain a sound knowledge of the menu and presentation standards for food and drinks
‚Ä¢ Ensure that the handover, closing and opening procedures are complete in each shift
‚Ä¢ Perform other duties/tasks as required


Requirements:
- Minimum 1 year of experience at supervisory role in managing a Cafe/Restaurant/Fast food sector or other sectors
- Good people management skills, strong communication skills and hands-on duties
- Ability to prioritize tasks and manage time effectively
- Desire to work in a fast-paced environment and work well under pressure
- Pleasant, mature, outgoing, meticulous with good interpersonal skills
* People who are looking for a place for career growth and providing professional service are encouraged to apply
* Attractive remuneration and benefit package
* Position available at different locations

title: Management Trainee
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
WHO WE ARE?
üî∏ Well known Bubble Tea company
üî∏ We are currently expanding our operations and are looking for Management Trainees with the potential to be promoted to Support store manager.

WHAT WE OFFER?
üî∏ Attractive Income
üî∏ Valuable Paid Training Provided
üî∏ Good career progression

WHAT CAN YOU LEARN?
As a Management Trainee, you will be undergoing a training of 12 months (6months+2months+2months+2months) to develop you as key person in our company's key business functions. We are proud of our management trainees and have great respect for the work you do. Therefore, we value your training and development program and your personal learning journey throughout the program.

You will be assigned a mentor/coach throughout the training to facilitate learning process.

The below course is designed to allowed selected trainees the best hands-on training experience, this is the perfect opportunity to build a successful management career.

First 6 months (Basic and Work shift development)
‚Ä¢ You will be trained to handle full outlet operations in the first 6 months which includes backend kitchen duties, front end customer services, tea making procedure, product quality assurance, manpower planning and cost controlling.
Second 2 months (Training store)
‚Ä¢ You will be assigned to other training outlets to apply what you have been learn in the past 6 months; you will guide the new join as a mentor/coach‚Äôs anger.
Third 2 months (Leadership development)
‚Ä¢ You will learn how to manage a store to understand the fundamentals of business structure and develop your strengths to build your leadership qualities.
Fourth 2 months (QC/Training course)
‚Ä¢You will also have the chance to attend QC and Training course that will equip with essential expertise to perform future assigned positions.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
‚Ä¢Assist the manager in the daily management of the day-to-day operations of the restaurant
‚Ä¢Attend to customers' request efficiently and effectively
‚Ä¢Maintain restaurant cleanliness

Fresh graduates ,no experience and career switcher are welcomed to apply.
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

BENEFITS:
‚Ä¢ Attractive remuneration. Salary commensurate with experience.
‚Ä¢ Transport Allowances
‚Ä¢ Meal Allowances
‚Ä¢ Staff drink
‚Ä¢ Annual Leave
‚Ä¢ Health and Dental Benefits
‚Ä¢ Training and Career Progression
‚Ä¢ Training provided
‚Ä¢ Terms and Conditions apply

title: production manager
Procurement Manager
job_category: Building and Construction, Logistics / Supply Chain, Manufacturing, Purchasing / Merchandising, Sales / Retail
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
The majority of your responsibilities will include achieving strategic procurement cost containment through the development of long-term commodity strategies and creating a supply chain that is robust and flexible to change in order to adapt to changing business conditions. You will need to lead the logistic team and collaborate with internal and external stakeholders.
Planning and Strategy: Developing and implementing supply chain strategies, policies, and procedures to optimize efficiency, reduce costs, and improve overall performance. This includes identifying areas for improvement and developing action plans.
Procurement: Managing the procurement process, including sourcing suppliers, negotiating contracts, quotation comparison and ensuring timely delivery of goods and services. This involves evaluating suppliers, monitoring supplier performance, and maintaining good relationships with key suppliers.
Inventory Management: Monitoring inventory levels to ensure optimal stock levels while minimizing carrying costs. This includes weekly updates, annual stock taking, forecasting demand, coordinating with suppliers and installation/service teams to ensure timely replenishment, and implementing inventory control measures.
Logistics and Distribution: Overseeing the movement of goods from suppliers to customers, store to workshop, ensuring efficient transportation, warehousing, and distribution processes. This includes selecting appropriate transportation modes, managing warehouse operations, and coordinating with logistics service providers.
Demand Planning and Forecasting: Collaborating with sales and marketing teams to understand market demand, analyze historical data, and develop accurate forecasts. This information is used to optimize production plans, inventory levels, and supply chain responsiveness.
Risk Management: Identifying potential risks and developing contingency plans to mitigate them. This includes assessing supplier reliability, developing business continuity plans, and ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.
Collaboration and Coordination: Facilitating effective communication and collaboration between various departments, such as procurement, installation, sales, servicing and customer service. This involves aligning objectives, resolving conflicts, and promoting a smooth flow of information within the supply chain.
Performance Measurement and Analysis: Monitoring key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess the efficiency and effectiveness of the supply chain. Analyzing data and implementing improvement initiatives based on insights gained from performance metrics.
Technology and Systems: Utilizing supply chain management software and technologies to streamline processes, enhance visibility, and improve decision-making. This may include implementing and managing enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems, inventory management tools, and supply chain analytics platforms.
Continuous Improvement: Leading continuous improvement initiatives to identify and implement best practices, optimize processes, and drive efficiency gains throughout the supply chain.
Assist Deputy General Manager in any other task whenever required
You may be assigned to new duties/responsibility from time to time
Minimum diploma in relevant field
Minimum 3 years of experience in relevant field
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $4,000.00 - $5,000.00 per month
Benefits:
Cell phone reimbursement
Free parking
Schedule:
Monday to Friday
Weekend availability
Supplemental pay types:
Performance bonus
Yearly bonus
Education:
Local Polytechnic Diploma (Required)
Experience:
Supply chain management: 3 years (Required)
Work Location: In person

title: GENERAL MANAGER
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
General Manager Job Description Template
We are looking for a self-motivated and results-driven general manager to direct and manage our organization's business activities and to develop and implement effective business strategies and programs. The successful candidate for this role should possess excellent communication skills, superior knowledge of business functions, exceptional budgeting, and finance skills, and strong leadership qualities.
General Manager Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Oversee day-to-day operations, assign weekly performance goals and ensure their completion, and accomplish your own goals
‚Ä¢ Recruit, onboard, and train high-performing employees to achieve objectives for sales, profitability, and market share
‚Ä¢ Develop strategic plan for optimized productivity
‚Ä¢ Review and improve organizational effectiveness by developing processes, overseeing employees, establishing a highly motivational work environment, and implementing innovative changes
‚Ä¢ Adhere to company standards for excellence and quality
‚Ä¢ Seek out opportunities for expansion and growth by developing new business relationships
‚Ä¢ Provide guidance and feedback to help others strengthen specific knowledge/skill areas
‚Ä¢ Maintain project timelines to ensure tasks are accomplished effectively
‚Ä¢ Develop, implement, and maintain budgetary and resource allocation plans
‚Ä¢ Delegate responsibilities to the best-qualified employees and enforce all policies, procedures, standards, specifications, guidelines, training programs, and cultural values
‚Ä¢ Resolve internal staff conflicts efficiently and to the mutual benefit of all involved
General Manager Required skills and qualifications
‚Ä¢ Degree in business management or any related field.
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of different business functions
‚Ä¢ Proven success in a managerial role
‚Ä¢ Strong decision-making ability
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication, collaboration, and delegation skills
‚Ä¢ Proven ability to develop and achieve financial plans
‚Ä¢ Ability to motivate and lead employees, and hold them accountable
‚Ä¢ Strong working knowledge of operational procedures
‚Ä¢ Meticulous attention to detail.
‚Ä¢ The ability to work under pressure.
‚Ä¢ Availability to work within opening hours (e.g. evenings, holidays, weekends).

title: Project Manager
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:
Report directly to Project Director on budgeting, schedules, materials, resources related to the project
Must be able to execute project independently from start to end (with minimal supervision)
Maintain adequate project documentation and ensure that all tender submissions comply with project specifications
Manage the day-to-day site operations

title: Warehouse Manager
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Lead the planning and setup of a new warehouse, focusing on efficient space utilization and material flow. Facilitate the implementation of the SAP module and establish standard operating procedures. Develop a skilled team of material handlers to support warehouse operations.
Supervise the Warehouse team in handling various tasks, including receiving, inspection, and management of defective goods, as well as issuing raw materials to Production. Ensure that the Warehouse operation complies with Environment, Health, and Safety (EHS) regulations.
Maintain high inventory accuracy through regular cycle counts, adhering to established schedules and guidelines. Investigate and understand inventory variances, implementing improvements as needed.
Utilize SAP, FIFO, and the Kanban system to manage inventory efficiently, monitor obsolescence, and drive inventory reduction in collaboration with the Materials Management team.
Optimize the layout of the warehouse to ensure effective use of space and proper storage of products while closely monitoring inventory levels.
Take responsibility for inbound logistics, arranging the cost-effective and efficient movement of goods in compliance with organizational policies and relevant customs laws and processes.
Devise and implement logistics and warehouse strategies, aiming to increase efficiency and cost management.
Identify opportunities for improvements in internal and external logistics systems or processes and implement necessary changes.
Provide strong leadership to the warehousing and logistics team.
Job Requirements:
Possess a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Supply Chain, Business, or Engineering.
Have a minimum of 10 years of experience in a manufacturing environment.
Demonstrate a solid understanding of warehouse operations and management.
Proficient in Microsoft Office, with additional knowledge in SAP being advantageous.

title: Project Manager
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
1. Ensure projects are completed in time and within cost budget and is in accordance to the main con given schedule.
2. Develop & maintain a detailed project plan.
3. Make key organisation/commercial decisions for the project.
4. Prioritise project goals with other ongoing project.
5. Maintain good relationship with project team. Communicating with other key organisation representatives.
6. Record, manage and resolve project issues where necessary, including any variation works that will incur addition cost and time implication.
7. Monitor project progress and performance.
8. Manage consultant input within the project budget.
9. Report to the Project Director monthly on the work progress, project budget & progress claims.
10. Submit monthly progress claims to client.
11. Any other duties as assigned by Management from time to time.

title: Finance Manager
job_category: Accounting / Auditing / Taxation, Banking and Finance
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
JOB DESIGNATION: Finance Manager
Job Title: Finance Manager
Relationship: Accounting, Finance Team, Admin Support, Human Resource

ABOUT OUR COMPANY
Antz Capital is a boutique corporate advisory firm that partners entrepreneurs, industry leaders and financial industry leaders to assist Small & Medium Enterprises (SMEs) to achieve their growth aspirations. In particular, our strength is in accelerating the business expansion plans of medium-sized companies as we provide high value advise on capital markets, Initial Public Offering (IPO) in local and overseas exchanges Mergers & Acquisitions (M&As), corporate restructuring, private equity and more.
Management Consulting & Corporate Advisory ‚Äì From management consulting to corporate advisory, we work hand-in-hand with entrepreneurs on business transformation and corporate strategy so as to attract investors, business partnerships and talents.
Sell-side Advisory ‚Äì We support entrepreneurs in investor-matching opportunities from angel investors to institutional funders, venture capitalists and investment bankers.
Buy-side Investment ‚Äì We focus on investing our resources and expertise in selected businesses. As such, the chosen entrepreneurs are guided, mentored, coached and trained to grow from entrepreneurs to investors. We also have an investor club where selected projects are shown to buy-side UHNWs, funds, family offices and others.

CRITERIONS
Passionate in helping SMEs
Financial Accounting - Maintain accurate financial accounts and records for all business entities with supporting documentation. This also includes review of monthly group consolidation, compliance including but not limited to taxation;
Financial Planning and Analysis - Providing business insights by preparing financial reports to roll out individual budgets;
Policies and Procedures - Assist in formalizing and implementation on all the current and new policies and procedures with finance relevant;
Independent and entrepreneurial - Show the ability to work with minimal direction in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment;
Finance controllership ‚Äì Enhance on process, compliance, governance and Opex;
Mentorship ‚Äì Provide guidance to develop our existing finance team.
Good time-management skills
Team player

COMPETENCIES
BSc/BA in Accounting, Finance or relevant field; MSc/MBA or CPA is a highly desirable
At least 5 years‚Äô experience in the finance industry and proven experience in listed company as CFO, financial controller, or relevant role
Preferably have experience to walk through the listing of a company / IPO process before
In depth knowledge of corporate financial law and risk management practices
Ability to strategize and solve problems
Strong leadership and organizational skills
Must possess excellent interpersonal and communication skills with the executive presence to work with senior management, investors and external stakeholders.
An analytical mind, comfortable with numbers
Excellent knowledge of data analysis and forecasting methods
Proficient in the use of MS Office and financial management software (e.g. Xero)
Strong sense of work commitment and responsibility.
CPA/ CA is a strong advantage
Able to communicate in Chinese language to coordinate and handle queries from Chinese speaking counterparts in regards with the development of market content matters
Ability to work independently and a high performance-orientation
Able to work under pressure and meeting deadlines
Objective and task oriented

CHARACTER
‚óè Can Do + Relentless + Never Give Up
‚óè Self-Motivated + Energetic
‚óè Resourceful + Creative
‚óè Relish challenges + Open-minded
‚óè People person + Relationship builder
‚óè Fast + Empathy skill
‚óè Discipline + Structured

CREDENTIALS
‚óè Proven Grade A Employee
‚óè Tertiary certificate (preferred), welcome aspirers who have strong experience and track record with no tertiary certificate


CAREER
‚óè Promotion pathway; Senior Management of a listed company
‚óè Acquire Skills; Management, Leadership, Mentorship
‚óè Acquire Know-how; Business Model (Scalable & Sustainable)
‚óè As Capital Entrepreneur, Entrepreneurship environment & development

Interested candidates do send us your resume via WhatsApp or Telegram to 87141919 or email to hr@pifcapital.com

Able to start immediately will be an advantage
We apologize that we will only respond to shortlisted candidates.

Thank you for applying.

title: Restaurant Manager
address: THE SAIL @ MARINA BAY, 2 MARINA BOULEVARD 018987
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Shi Wei Xian Pte. Ltd. is a newly established restaurant specializing in Hunan cuisine. We embrace a marketing approach that offers a wide variety of dishes with a focus on quick and efficient meal preparation. Our restaurant is designed to cater to the fast-paced lifestyles of today's society, ensuring our customers have a memorable dining experience. We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Restaurant Manager to join our growing restaurant in Singapore. As a Restaurant Manager at Shi Wei Xian, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our restaurant.

Job Responsibilities:
‚óè Innovate the menu, aligning with company goals. Oversee updates and seasonal changes.
‚óè Manage finances, resource allocation, and focus on restaurant financial health.
‚óè Oversee daily restaurant operations, ensuring seamless service for exceptional dining.
‚óè Foster staff inspiration, creating a motivated team for exceptional customer service.
‚óè Supervise food quality, ingredients, cost-efficiency, and Hunan cuisine innovation.
‚óè Maintain high cleanliness, hygiene, and safety standards, prioritizing customer well-being and compliance.
‚óè Handle customer feedback professionally to maintain high satisfaction levels.
‚óè Establish and maintain standardized procedures and policies for operational consistency and efficiency.

Requirements:
‚óè Exhibit a strong track record in product development, financial management, and cost control, ensuring the restaurant's financial viability.
‚óè Possess an extensive understanding of Hunan cuisine, particularly in ingredient management, cost control, and menu innovation.
‚óè Give preference to candidates with at least 15 years of managerial experience, emphasizing extensive background in the food and beverage industry.
‚óè Display effective communication abilities in both Chinese and English .
‚óè This role entails relocation and frequent international travel, highlighting the importance of mobility and adaptability.

SKYLINE BUSINESS CONSULTING PTE. LTD. (14C7389)

title: Operations Manager
job_category: Accounting / Auditing / Taxation, Customer Service, Environment / Health, Human Resources
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities as Operations Manager
‚¶Å To ensure the daily operations are running smoothly

title: BIM Manager
job_category: Architecture / Interior Design, Building and Construction, Design, Engineering, Real Estate / Property Management
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
BIM Manager
Email : CV@ourrecruiters.com

Job Description:
Lead a team of structural archi coordinators/BIM modellers.
Develop, maintain, and update the BEP.
Oversee the BIM Deliverables progresses and BIM implementation processes of the Contract.
Attend and chair VDC and technical meetings with Clients, Consultants and Sub-contractors.
Plan, organize and supervise the production of submission drawings and construction drawings.
Coordinate and collaborate with all parties within the Contract and interfacing contracts‚Äô BIM Managers and or BIM Coordinators.
Establish, implement, and facilitate clash detection analysis to identify, resolve and validate all design and construction conflicts within the Contract and Interfacing Parties.
Good knowledge in AutoCAD, Revit, Navisworks & MicroStation, etc.
Update, manage, monitor, and track all model changes records.
Establish clash detection analysis matrix and 3D Coordination schedule.
Prepare, maintain, and update the clash detection analysis resolution and validation reports. To ensure and enforce all identified design and construction conflicts have been rectified.
Oversee, coordinate, and manage the BIM Coordinators within the Contract to meet all BIM Deliverables submission and information exchange schedules.
Supervise Modeler / Technical Co-ordinator and prepare drawings.
Ensure models / drawings accuracy based on BIM standards and BIM project workflow criteria / checklist.
Ensure all productions are completed on schedule or in a timely manner.
Requirements:
A recognized Degree/Diploma in Architecture/Construction
Minimum 10 years of relevant working experience in local industry
Certification in BIM Management from BCA is preferred.
Knowledge and experience with Singapore Authority submission(LTA, Healthcare), BIM Standards.
Good knowledge of BIM software (Revit, Autocad, Navisworks).

title: GENERAL MANAGER
job_category: Customer Service, F&B, General Management, Sales / Retail, Others
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
This position will be accountable for planning, coordinating and managing staff and services to ensure efficient and effective F&B operations and that customer service standards are maintained at all times.
This role will encompass the formulation and implementation of operating procedures and standards, the management and development of team members, and liaise with executive management to ensure that company‚Äô short and long term goals are met.
Work with team members in service and food preparation to minimize wastage and increase productivity and efficiency. Review operating results with the team and identify opportunities to improve performance.
Ensure all cashiering procedures are processed in compliance with accounting standards.
Monitor and minimize wastage of consumables and maintain labor productivity ratios.
Anticipate heavy business times and organize procedures to handle extended waiting lines.
Monitor guest reactions and confer frequently with service staff or captains to ensure guest satisfaction.
Respond to guest comments, requests and complaints in a timely and professional manner. Take personal responsibility to resolve issues.
Manage Human Resources responsibilities for assigned department(s) to include: creating a work environment that promotes teamwork, performance feedback, recognition, mutual respect and employee satisfaction; quality hiring, training and succession planning processes that encompass the company‚Äôs diversity commitment; compliance with company policies and legal requirements.
Maintains guest profiles on a daily basis and takes appropriate actions as necessary
